BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 While installing pysyft according to steps in INSTALLATION.md, running python setup.py install udacity gives error: invalid command 'udacity'.
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 1.Follow instructions in INSTALLATION.md to install PySyft for Linux.
 2. run python setup.py install udacity
 Desktop (please complete the following information):
 
 OS: [linux ubuntu 18.04]

comments_0.comment_text:
Were you able to install PySyft or not ?
 If not then just try running
 python setup.py install

comments_1.comment_text:
I think udacity command also installs tf_encrypted besides core requirements.
 That I think you can manually install in my opinion.

comments_2.comment_text: I think we should mention that you can install tf_encrypted using req_udacity.txt in the pip-dep folder, should I make changes in the INSTALLATION.md?

comments_3.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/J-Yash>@J-Yash</denchmark-link>
   PR got merged. If this issue is resolved, it should not be opened anymore
